description: The coded value domain includes both the actual value that is stored in a database and a description of what the code value means.
title: codedValue

___codedValues.description: A set of valid values with unique names.

$eref.description: A set of valid coded values with unique names.
$eref.title: codedValue

___name.description: A string value given for the coded domain.

___code.description: String value indicating which unqiue code is used to identify the feature attribute.

___type.description: String value representing the domain type.
